title: Boards Bug
body:
Hey there! So I was posting in CC and it was working fine, but when I went back to the Board it was showing as "early to the party...create a new discussion". This happened on both CC and Boards Feedback. I took some screenshots in case it helps!

Edit: 
Happened around 2am PST...but it's fine now. Weird!

replies.body: Hey LoveU2MoonNBack, we are in fact aware of this bug and are actively working on it. It's a troublemaker for sure so for now refresh if you run into it.
I've experienced the same bug, and also one where the "new" sorting was showing 2-month-old posts. Don't know how to recreate them, though :(
